item.name: Accounts receivable
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED 1 AS TypeRegister, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SecondPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.MinutePeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.HourPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.DayPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.YearPeriod, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Company, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Counterparty, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Contract, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Document, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Order, AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.Contract.SettlementsCurrency AS Currency, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance > 0 THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS CounterpartyDebtOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS OurDebtOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance > 0 THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS TotalOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance > 0 THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS CounterpartyDebtClosingBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS OurDebtEndBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance > 0 THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS TotalClosingBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance > 0 THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS CounterpartyDebtCurOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS OurDebtCurOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance > 0 THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS TotalCurOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance > 0 THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS CounterpartyDebtCurClosingBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS OurDebtCurClosingBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance > 0 THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS TotalCurClosingBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountReceipt ELSE 0 END AS DebtIncreasing, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountExpense - AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountReceipt ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountExpense ELSE 0 END AS DebtDecreasing, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurReceipt ELSE 0 END AS DebtIncreasingCur, CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurExpense - AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurReceipt ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurExpense ELSE 0 END AS DebtDecreasingCur FROM AccumulationRegister.AccountsReceivable.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, , ) AS AccountsReceivableBalancesAndTurnovers

item.name: Accounts payable
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED 2 AS TypeRegister, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SecondPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.MinutePeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.HourPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.DayPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.YearPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Company, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Counterparty, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Contract, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Document, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Order, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Contract.SettlementsCurrency AS Currency, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS CounterpartyDebtOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance > 0 THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS OurDebtOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance > 0 THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS TotalOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS CounterpartyDebtClosingBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance > 0 THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS OurDebtEndBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance > 0 THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS TotalClosingBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS CounterpartyDebtCurOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance > 0 THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS OurDebtCurOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance > 0 THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS TotalCurOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS CounterpartyDebtCurClosingBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance > 0 THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS OurDebtCurClosingBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance < 0 THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance > 0 THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS TotalCurClosingBalance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountExpense - AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountReceipt ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountExpense ELSE 0 END AS DebtIncreasing, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountReceipt ELSE 0 END AS DebtDecreasing, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurExpense - AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurReceipt ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurExpense ELSE 0 END AS DebtIncreasingCur, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurReceipt ELSE 0 END AS DebtDecreasingCur FROM AccumulationRegister.AccountsPayable.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, , ) AS AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers

v8:item.v8:content: The debt of the counterparty is:
